summary: A man wakes up to find himself locked in a cramped concrete maze of corridors, in which he can barely move. He doesn't remember why he is there or how he got there. He has a terrible stomach injury and is slowly bleeding to death.
cast: Shin'ya Tsukamoto|Takahiro Murase|Takahiro Kandaka|Masato Tsujioka|Mao Saito|Kaori Fujii
keywords: written and directed by cast member|japanese shocker|surrealism|survival|maze
title: Haze
